mapper.sql: id, house_flow_id as houseFlowId, worker_id as workerId, worker_type_id as workerTypeId, worker_type as workerType, house_id as houseId, apply_type as applyType, suspend_day as suspendDay, end_date as endDate, start_date as startDate, apply_dec as applyDec, member_check as memberCheck, supervisor_check as supervisorCheck, apply_money as applyMoney, pay_state as payState, other_money as otherMoney, supervisor_money as supervisorMoney, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate
mapper.select:
select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where member_check = 0 and ( ((apply_type=1 or apply_type=2) and (supervisor_check = 1)) or apply_type=0 ) and #{time} > end_date

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where (apply_type=1 or apply_type=2) and supervisor_check = 0 and #{time} > start_date

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where house_flow_id = #{houseFlowId} and (supervisor_check = 2 or member_check = 2) and apply_type in (1,2)

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where house_id = #{houseId} and (supervisor_check = 0 or (supervisor_check = 1 and member_check = 0)) and worker_type_id = #{workerTypeId} and apply_type in (1,2)

select count(*) from dj_core_house_flow_apply where house_id = #{houseId} and apply_type = 5
AND worker_type_id=#{workerTypeId}

select count(*) from dj_core_house_flow_apply where house_id = #{houseId} and apply_type = 5
AND worker_id=#{workerId}

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where 1=1 and house_id = #{houseId} and worker_id = #{workerId} and apply_type = 4 and to_days(create_date) = to_days(#{time}) LIMIT 1

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where house_id = #{houseId} and apply_type = 4 and to_days(create_date) = to_days(#{time}) order by create_date LIMIT 1

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where house_id = #{houseId} and apply_type = 4 order by create_date LIMIT 1

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where (apply_type=1 or apply_type=2) and house_id = #{houseId} and supervisor_check = 0

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where to_days(create_date) = to_days(#{time}) and house_id = #{houseId} and apply_type = 5 order by create_date desc

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where 1=1 and house_flow_id = #{houseFlowId} and (member_check = 0 or member_check = 4) and worker_id = #{workerId} LIMIT 1

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where 1=1 and house_id = #{houseId} and apply_type =4 and worker_id = #{workerId} order by create_date asc
select sum(suspend_day) from dj_core_house_flow_apply where 1=1 and house_id = #{houseId} and apply_type =3 and supervisor_check =1 and worker_id = #{workerId}

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where 1=1 and house_id = #{houseId} and apply_type = 4 and to_days(create_date) = to_days(#{time})

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where 1=1 and (apply_type=1 or apply_type=2 or apply_type=3) and house_flow_id = #{houseFlowId} and supervisor_check = 0 and worker_id = #{workerId}

select
from dj_core_house_flow_apply where house_flow_id = #{houseFlowId} order by create_date DESC

SELECT
FROM dj_core_house_flow_apply WHERE 1 = 1 AND house_id = #{houseId} AND (apply_type=0 OR supervisor_check=1)
and worker_type_id=#{workerTypeId}
ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT f.id, f.house_flow_id houseFlowId, f.worker_type workerType, f.apply_type applyType, f.create_date createDate, f.start_date startDate, f.worker_id workerId, f.operator, f.end_date endDate, ( CASE WHEN f.apply_type = 3 THEN f.apply_dec ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(fi.name) END ) AS applyDec FROM `dj_core_house_flow_apply` f LEFT JOIN `dj_matter_technology_record` fi ON fi.house_flow_apply_id = f.id AND fi.state = 1 WHERE f.data_status = 0 AND f.member_check = 1 AND f.house_id = #{houseId} AND ( f.apply_type = 0 OR f.apply_type = 1 OR f.apply_type = 2 OR f.apply_type = 3 OR f.apply_type = 4 ) AND date_format(f.create_date, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{month},'%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY f.id ORDER BY f.create_date DESC

SELECT chfa.id, chfa.create_date AS createDate, chfa.modify_date AS modifyDate, chfa.start_date AS startDate, chfa.end_date AS endDate, chfa.apply_dec AS applyDec, chfa.apply_type AS applyType, chfa.house_flow_id AS houseFlowId, chfa.house_id AS houseId, chfa.member_check AS memberCheck, chfa.supervisor_check AS supervisorCheck, chfa.worker_type_id AS workerTypeId, chfa.worker_type AS workerType, chfa.worker_id AS workerId, chfa.suspend_day AS suspendDay, chfa.apply_money AS applyMoney, chfa.pay_state AS payState, chfa.other_money AS otherMoney, chfa.supervisor_money AS supervisorMoney, chfa.data_status AS dataStatus, chfa.operator, c. STATUS, chfa.acceptance_number AS acceptanceNumber, chfa.type, chfa.acceptance_task_id AS acceptanceTaskId FROM dj_core_house_flow_apply chfa LEFT JOIN dj_complain c ON chfa.id = c.business_id WHERE chfa.apply_type IN (1, 2, 10) AND (chfa.worker_type NOT IN (1,2,3) OR (chfa.worker_type = 3 AND chfa.type = 1)) AND chfa.supervisor_check BETWEEN 1 AND 2 AND chfa.house_id=#{houseId} ORDER BY chfa.create_date DESC

SELECT chfa.id, chfa.create_date AS createDate, chfa.modify_date AS modifyDate, chfa.start_date AS startDate, chfa.end_date AS endDate, chfa.apply_dec AS applyDec, chfa.apply_type AS applyType, chfa.house_flow_id AS houseFlowId, chfa.house_id AS houseId, chfa.member_check AS member_check, chfa.supervisor_check AS supervisorCheck, chfa.worker_type_id AS workerTypeId, chfa.worker_type AS workerType, chfa.worker_id AS workerId, chfa.suspend_day AS suspendDay, chfa.apply_money AS applyMoney, chfa.pay_state AS payState, chfa.other_money AS otherMoney, chfa.supervisor_money AS supervisorMoney, chfa.data_status AS dataStatus, chfa.operator, c.status FROM dj_core_house_flow_apply chfa LEFT JOIN dj_complain c ON chfa.id = c.business_id WHERE chfa.house_flow_id = #{houseFlowId} AND chfa.worker_type = 3

SELECT a.id houseFlowApplyId, a.house_flow_id houseFlowId, a.house_id houseId, t. NAME workerTypeName, t.color workerTypeColor, a.worker_type workerType, a.worker_id workerId, w. NAME workerName, a.apply_dec applyDec, a.create_date createDate, GROUP_CONCAT(i.image_url) imageList FROM `dj_core_house_flow_apply` a INNER JOIN dj_core_worker_type t ON t.id = a.worker_type_id INNER JOIN dj_member w ON w.id = a.worker_id LEFT JOIN dj_core_house_flow_apply_image i ON i.house_flow_apply_id = a.id WHERE (a.`id` = #{houseFlowApplyId}) or (a.house_flow_apply_id=#{houseFlowApplyId}) ORDER BY a.create_date

SELECT chfa.id, chfa.create_date AS createDate, chfa.modify_date AS modifyDate, chfa.start_date AS startDate, chfa.end_date AS endDate, chfa.apply_dec AS applyDec, chfa.apply_type AS applyType, chfa.house_flow_id AS houseFlowId, chfa.house_id AS houseId, chfa.member_check AS member_check, chfa.supervisor_check AS supervisorCheck, chfa.worker_type_id AS workerTypeId, chfa.worker_type AS workerType, chfa.worker_id AS workerId, chfa.suspend_day AS suspendDay, chfa.apply_money AS applyMoney, chfa.pay_state AS payState, chfa.other_money AS otherMoney, chfa.supervisor_money AS supervisorMoney, chfa.data_status AS dataStatus, chfa.operator, c. STATUS FROM dj_core_house_flow_apply chfa INNER JOIN dj_complain c ON chfa.id = c.business_id WHERE chfa.id=#{houseFlowApplyId}
